title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 506.9 - Rates of payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 506.9 - Rates of payment

State Regulations
(a) Rates of
payment shall be established on a prospective basis. (b) Each rate of payment under this section
shall be a regional monthly fee. (c) Rates of payment established pursuant to
this section shall be reviewed by the Department of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
506.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
